subject: Law and Legislation
United States Defense and Military Forces
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: A 281-148 vote defeated an amendment to a larger government financing bill that would have ended Army’s sponsorship of the No. 39 Chevrolet car, among other motorsports programs.
snippet: A 281-148 vote defeated an amendment to a larger government financing bill that would have ended Army’s sponsorship of the No. 39 Chevrolet car, among other motorsports programs.
